description.narrative: Output 703.5 RKLA 5 - Children's Right to be born and remain HIV-free: The RO will advance a programmatic environment in the region that enables achievement of the goals of elimination of HIV transmission to infants (MTCT), keeping their mothers alive and ensuring access to prevention, treatment, care and support for the most vulnerable, socially excluded and HIV affected women, children and adolescents

sector.narrative: HIV testing including self testing and counselling in adolescents

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services

title.narrative: UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Baltic States (Europe and Central Asia Regional) Evaluation Reports
Europe and Central Asia Regional Office 2018 Annual Report
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 703.5 RKLA 5 - Children’s Right to be born and remain HIV-free: The RO will advance a programmatic environment in the region that enables achievement of the goals of elimination of HIV transmission to infants (MTCT), keeping their mothers alive and ensuring access to prevention, treatment, care and support for the most vulnerable, socially excluded and HIV affected women, children and adolescents
# of COs with activities that support national governments and civil society to: develop sustainable services for integrated HIV prevention, including PMTCT for drug dependent women.
# of COs with activities that support national governments and civil society to: share knowledge, experience and good practices through horizontal cooperation platforms.
# of COs with activities that support national governments and civil society to: develop sustainable services for HIV testing and counselling for adolescent key-affected populations.

# of COs with activities that support national governments and civil society to: update national protocols/plans/ strategies/policies on the elimination of new infections in children and keeping their mothers alive, and on prevention and care for most-at-risk/vulnerable adolescents and HIV infected children and adolescents.
